title: The EU’s ruinous waiting game
summary_full: Ukraine is really an existential issue for Europe, and the EU. But it seems no one has the guts to really do something about it
summary_public: Ukraine is really an existential issue for Europe, and the EU. But it seems no one has the guts to really do something about it
